column1: Possible symptoms include: - Blurred vision - Confusion - Depression - Disorientation or hallucinations - Fainting - Halos around objects (yellow, green, white) - Headache - Irregular or slow heartbeat - Lethargy - Loss of appetite - Low blood pressure - Rash or hives - Stomach pain - Vomiting, nausea, or diarrhea - Weakness or drowsiness Hallucinations, loss of appetite, and halos are usually only seen in people who have been poisoned over a long period of time.
